Description:
Detects the execution of different compiled Windows binaries of the impacket toolset (based on names or part of their names - could lead to false positives)

Author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: HackTool - Impacket Tools Execution
Query:
sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where (process_path like '%\goldenpac%' or process_path like '%\karmasmb%' or process_path like '%\kintercept%' or process_path like '%
tlmrelayx%' or process_path like '%pcdump%' or process_path like '%\samrdump%' or process_path like '%\secretsdump%' or process_path like '%\smbexec%' or process_path like '%\smbrelayx%' or process_path like '%\wmiexec%' or process_path like '%\wmipersist%') and (process_path like '%\atexec_windows.exe' or process_path like '%\dcomexec_windows.exe' or process_path like '%\dpapi_windows.exe' or process_path like '% inddelegation_windows.exe' or process_path like '%\getadusers_windows.exe' or process_path like '%\getnpusers_windows.exe' or process_path like '%\getpac_windows.exe' or process_path like '%\getst_windows.exe' or process_path like '%\gettgt_windows.exe' or process_path like '%\getuserspns_windows.exe' or process_path like '%\ifmap_windows.exe' or process_path like '%\mimikatz_windows.exe' or process_path like '%
etview_windows.exe' or process_path like '%
mapanswermachine_windows.exe' or process_path like '%\opdump_windows.exe' or process_path like '%\psexec_windows.exe' or process_path like '%dp_check_windows.exe' or process_path like '%\sambapipe_windows.exe' or process_path like '%\smbclient_windows.exe' or process_path like '%\smbserver_windows.exe' or process_path like '%\sniff_windows.exe' or process_path like '%\sniffer_windows.exe' or process_path like '%\split_windows.exe' or process_path like '%	icketer_windows.exe')
